biotools.summary: SpecHap is an ultra fast phasing algorithm based on spectral graph analysis. SpecHap currently support general WGS sequencing, Hi-C, 10X linked-reads, PacBio SMRT and Oxford Nanopore .

bioschemas.name: SpecHap
